a type of brandy (= a strong alcoholic drink made from wine) from Peru or Chile: Pisco is derived from distilled fermented grapes, and has an alcohol content of around forty percent. Add a drop of olive oil to each scallop and six drops of Pisco or whisky. See also
pisco sour
